title: Saving Oliver
description: What would you do to save your friend?… and what if that friend lived 100 years ago?Peter Seth has unusual visions that separate him from others and keep him a loner. When he meets Oliver, who also possesses this unusual ability, Peter finally finds acceptance. This friendship is short-lived, however, because Oliver’s life ended 100 years ago. Peter has only a few weeks to prevent this death from happening again … or he’ll relive it with Oliver.
author: Carolyn A. Thomas
